entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Plain 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -27.0°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
